title: anyone else get a "internal service error" popup
body: So I bought some rp cards, and whenever I try to put in the code, I always get a popup that says "Internal Server Error". Just wondering if anyone has a way to fix it, or if it happened to anyone else.

replies.body: Not seeing any issues on our side with payment systems, but there could be something specifically going on with the method of payment being chosen.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look to see what's up and assist individually.  We'll see you there!
Thanks for the reply, I did submit a ticket and ended up getting it sorted out.
